mapper.select:
SELECT b.b_id as bId, b.number AS number, b.type, bm.breed_model AS breedModel, b.extent AS extent, b.input_weight AS inputWeight, b.status, b.breed_mark AS breedMark, b.input_time AS inputTime
FROM b_breed b LEFT JOIN b_breeding_mode bm ON b.bm_id = bm.bm_id where b.status = #{status} and b.type = #{type} order by b.b_id asc
